enumDescriptions.Audit: The event has been generated as part of Audit type
enumDescriptions.Configuration: The event has been generated as part of Configuration type
enumDescriptions.Storage: The event has been generated as part of Storage unit
enumDescriptions.SystemHealth: The event has been generated as part of System Health unit
enumDescriptions.Updates: The event has been generated as part of Updates
enumDescriptions.WorkNotes: The event has been generated as part of Work Notes

DellEvent.description: This is the complex property for the additional OEM properties.
DellEvent.longDescription: This is the complex property for the additional OEM properties.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

AgentID.description: This property provides the agentID for the event.
AgentID.longDescription: This property provides the agentID for the event.

BitMask.description: This property provides the action filter bit mask for the event.
BitMask.longDescription: This property provides the action filter bit mask for the event.

Category.description: This property provides the category for the event.
Category.longDescription: This property provides the category for the event.

SequenceNumber.description: This property provides the sequence number for the event.
SequenceNumber.longDescription: This property provides the sequence number for the event.

ServerHostname.description: This property provides the server hostname for the events.
ServerHostname.longDescription: This property provides the server hostname for the events.
